description: This Dart source file defines an AppRouter class for Flutter application navigation. It manages named routes, authentication guards, and route generation logic, routing users to different screens based on authentication status and provided arguments.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A utility class that manages route definitions, initial route selection based on authentication, and route generation with access control.

methods.name: initialRoute
methods.description: Determines the initial route based on whether the user is authenticated.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Factory method that creates routes based on route settings, applying authentication guards and passing necessary arguments to screens.

methods.name: guardedPushNamed
methods.description: Performs navigation to a given route name if the user is authenticated, otherwise redirects to login.
